result.html: seo sampla maith dá dtiteann amach nuair a thugann amaitéaraigh faoin taighdeThis is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.
result.ponchtml: seo sampla maiṫ dá dtiteann amaċ nuair a ṫugann amaitéaraiġ faoin taiġdeThis is a good example of what happens when amateurs undertake the research.

result.eng: For those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ga: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.orig: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaigh
result.html: ba mhaith an mhaise don dream a d'éalaighFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.
result.ponchtml: ba ṁaiṫ an ṁaise don dream a d'éalaiġFor those who escaped, it was a good thing that they did.

result.eng: As soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ga: ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.orig: ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nua
result.html: ar fáil amach do na cóilínigh go raibh talamh mhaith sa domhan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...
result.ponchtml: ar fáil amaċ do na cóilíniġ go raiḃ talaṁ ṁaiṫ sa doṁan nuaAs soon as the colonists found out that there as good land in the new world,...

result.eng: If he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ga: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.orig: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iad
result.html: má tá teach mór agus culaith mhaith éadaigh aigesean altaíodh sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.
result.ponchtml: má tá teaċ mór agus culaiṫ ṁaiṫ éadaiġ aigesean altaíoḋ sé iadIf he has a big house and good clothes, he should be thankful for them.

result.eng: It's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ga: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.orig: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duit
result.html: is maith a rinne tú an fhírinne a inse agus ar a shon sin ní bhainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.
result.ponchtml: is maiṫ a rinne tú an ḟírinne a inse agus ar a ẛon sin ní ḃainfear duitIt's a good thing you told the truth, and for that I'll leave you alone.

result.eng: The old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ga: ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.orig: ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbhean
result.html: ba bhreá amach an scéalaí an tseanbheanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.
result.ponchtml: ba ḃreá amaċ an scéalaí an tseanḃeanThe old woman was a damn good story-teller.

result.eng: Good-bye and good night.
result.ga: slán codlata agaibh
result.orig: slán codlata agaibh
result.html: slán codlata agaibhGood-bye and good night.
result.ponchtml: slán codlata agaiḃGood-bye and good night.

result.eng: It's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ga: tá an meán oíche ann slán codlata agaibh
result.orig: tá an meán oíche ann slán codlata agaibh
result.html: tá an meán oíche ann slán codlata agaibhIt's midnight. Good night to y'all.
result.ponchtml: tá an meán oíċe ann slán codlata agaiḃIt's midnight. Good night to y'all.

result.eng: I drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ga: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.orig: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaim
result.html: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur chaill mé mo mheabhair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.
result.ponchtml: d'ól mé agus d'ól mé gur ċaill mé mo ṁeaḃair agus mo stuaimI drank and I drank until I lost my sense and my good judgment.

result.eng: It's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
result.ga: is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istigh

result.html: is mór an gar gan an duine bocht a bheith istighIt's a good thing the poor man isn't in.
